001package org.jfree.chart.plot;
002
003
004import javax.swing.event.EventListenerList;
005import org.jfree.chart.event.PlotChangeListener;
006import org.jfree.chart.event.PlotChangeEvent;
007import java.io.Serializable;
008import org.jfree.chart.api.PublicCloneable;
009
010public class PlotProduct2 implements Serializable, PublicCloneable {
011        private transient EventListenerList listenerList;
012
013        public void setListenerList(EventListenerList listenerList) {
014                this.listenerList = listenerList;
015        }
016
017        /**
018        * Registers an object for notification of changes to the plot.
019        * @param listener   the object to be registered.
020        * @see #removeChangeListener(PlotChangeListener)
021        */
022        public void addChangeListener(PlotChangeListener listener) {
023                this.listenerList.add(PlotChangeListener.class, listener);
024        }
025
026        /**
027        * Unregisters an object for notification of changes to the plot.
028        * @param listener   the object to be unregistered.
029        * @see #addChangeListener(PlotChangeListener)
030        */
031        public void removeChangeListener(PlotChangeListener listener) {
032                this.listenerList.remove(PlotChangeListener.class, listener);
033        }
034
035        /**
036        * Sets a flag that controls whether or not listeners receive {@link PlotChangeEvent}  notifications.
037        * @param notify   a boolean.
038        * @see #isNotify()
039        */
040        public void setNotify(boolean notify, Plot plot) {
041                plot.setNotify2(notify);
042                if (notify) {
043                        notifyListeners(new PlotChangeEvent(plot), plot);
044                }
045        }
046
047        /**
048        * Notifies all registered listeners that the plot has been modified.
049        * @param event   information about the change event.
050        */
051        public void notifyListeners(PlotChangeEvent event, Plot plot) {
052                if (!plot.isNotify()) {
053                        return;
054                }
055                Object[] listeners = this.listenerList.getListenerList();
056                for (int i = listeners.length - 2; i >= 0; i -= 2) {
057                        if (listeners[i] == PlotChangeListener.class) {
058                                ((PlotChangeListener) listeners[i + 1]).plotChanged(event);
059                        }
060                }
061        }
062
063        public Object clone() throws CloneNotSupportedException {
064                return (PlotProduct2) super.clone();
065        }
066}
